ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to ensure information is populated for Rejection notification.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Credit_Application', ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed - Rejected'), OR(NOT( OR(ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Credit Application') ,ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Direct Debit Application'), ISPICKVAL( Type , 'NewsPay Application')) ), ISBLANK( Contact.Email )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must populate Type to Credit Application or Direct Debit Application and select an appropriate Contact with an email address before changing the Status to Closed - Rejected.
